translations: n.[数] 截头锥体；平截头体

sentences.sentence: Time spent culling objects outside the camera frustum.
sentences.translation: 摄像机视景外剔除对象花费的时间。

sentences.sentence: All vertices are clipped by the right plane of the viewing frustum.
sentences.translation: 所有顶点都被视图截锥的右平面所剪裁。

sentences.sentence: All vertices are clipped by the front plane of the viewing frustum.
sentences.translation: 所有顶点都被视图截锥的前平面所剪辑。
